# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.getTotalCount() method

Get the total number of direct listings

## Example

```javascript
const totalListings = await contract.directListings.getTotalCount();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTotalCount(): Promise<BigNumber>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt;

Returns the total number of direct listings created.
